verses.verse: "Hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H1004><s%> house of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> you who are called <S%H7121><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and have come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> who swear <S%H7650><s%> by the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and make mention <S%H2142><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> but not in truth, <S%H571><s%> nor in righteousness <S%H6666><s%>

(for they call <S%H7121><s%> themselves of the holy <S%H6944><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and stay <S%H5564><s%> themselves on the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>):

I have declared <S%H5046><s%> the former things <S%H7223><s%> from of old; <S%H227><s%> yes, <S%H3318><s%> they went forth out of my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and I showed <S%H8085><s%> them: <S%H6597><s%> suddenly I did <S%H6213><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> and they happened.
Because I knew <S%H1847><s%> that you are obstinate, <S%H7186><s%> and your neck <S%H6203><s%> is an iron <S%H1270><s%> sinew, <S%H1517><s%> and your brow <S%H4696><s%> brass; <S%H5154><s%>

therefore I have declared <S%H5046><s%> it to you from of old; <S%H227><s%> before it came to pass <S%H935><s%> I showed <S%H8085><s%> it to you; <S%H559><s%> lest you should say, <S%H6090><s%> 'My idol has done <S%H6213><s%> them, <S%H6459><s%> and my engraved image, and my molten image, <S%H5262><s%> has commanded them. <S%H6680><s%>'

You have heard <S%H8085><s%> it; <S%H2372><s%> see all this; <S%H5046><s%> and you, will you not declare it? <S%H8085><s%> "I have shown you new things <S%H5341><s%> from this time, <S%H6258><s%> even hidden things, <S%H5341><s%> which you have not known. <S%H3045><s%>

They are created <S%H1254><s%> now, <S%H6440><s%> and not from of old; and before this day <S%H3117><s%> you didn't <S%H8085><s%> hear them; <S%H559><s%> lest you should say, <S%H3045><s%> 'Behold, I knew them.'

Yes, <S%H8085><s%> you didn't hear; yes, <S%H3045><s%> you didn't know; yes, <S%H241><s%> from of old your ear was not opened: <S%H6605><s%> for I knew <S%H3045><s%> that you dealt very <S%H898><s%> treacherously, <S%H898><s%> and was called <S%H7121><s%> a transgressor <S%H6586><s%> from the womb. <S%H990><s%>
For my name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake will I defer <S%H748><s%> my anger, <S%H639><s%> and for my praise <S%H8416><s%> will I refrain <S%H2413><s%> for you, <S%H3772><s%> that I not cut you off.
Behold, <S%H6884><s%> I have refined you, <S%H3701><s%> but not as silver; I have chosen <S%H977><s%> you in the furnace <S%H3564><s%> of affliction. <S%H6040><s%>
For my own sake, <S%H6213><s%> for my own sake, will I do it; <S%H2490><s%> for how should my name be profaned? I will not give <S%H5414><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> to another. <S%H312><s%>
"Listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, <S%H3290><s%> O Jacob, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> my called: <S%H7121><s%> I am he; <S%H7223><s%> I am the first, I also am the last. <S%H314><s%>

Yes, <S%H3027><s%> my hand has laid the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and my right hand <S%H3225><s%> has spread <S%H2946><s%> out the heavens: <S%H8064><s%> when I call <S%H7121><s%> to them, <S%H5975><s%> they stand up together. <S%H3162><s%>

"Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves, <S%H8085><s%> all you, and hear; who among them has declared <S%H5046><s%> these things? <S%H3068><s%> He whom Yahweh loves <S%H157><s%> shall perform <S%H6213><s%> his pleasure <S%H2656><s%> on Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and his arm <S%H2220><s%> shall be on the Chaldeans. <S%H3778><s%>
I, <S%H1696><s%> even I, have spoken; yes, <S%H7121><s%> I have called him; <S%H935><s%> I have brought him, <S%H1870><s%> and he shall make his way prosperous. <S%H6743><s%>

"Come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to me and hear <S%H8085><s%> this: <S%H7218><s%> "From the beginning I have not spoken <S%H1696><s%> in secret; <S%H5643><s%> from the time <S%H6256><s%> that it was, <S%H136><s%> there am I." Now the Lord Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me, <S%H7307><s%> with his Spirit.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> your Redeemer, <S%H1350><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who teaches <S%H3925><s%> you to profit, <S%H3276><s%> who leads <S%H1869><s%> you by the way <S%H1870><s%> that you should go. <S%H3212><s%>

Oh that <S%H3863><s%> you had listened <S%H7181><s%> to my commandments! <S%H4687><s%> then your peace <S%H7965><s%> would have been like a river, <S%H5104><s%> and your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> like the waves <S%H1530><s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%>

your seed <S%H2233><s%> also had been as the sand, <S%H2344><s%> and the offspring <S%H6631><s%> of your body <S%H4578><s%> like its grains: <S%H4579><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> would not be cut off <S%H3772><s%> nor destroyed <S%H8045><s%> from before me. <S%H6440><s%>

Go forth <S%H3318><s%> from Babylon, <S%H894><s%> flee <S%H1272><s%> from the Chaldeans; <S%H3778><s%> with a voice <S%H6963><s%> of singing <S%H7440><s%> declare, <S%H5046><s%> tell <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H3318><s%> utter it even to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has redeemed <S%H1350><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

They didn't <S%H6770><s%> thirst when he led <S%H3212><s%> them through the deserts; <S%H2723><s%> he caused the waters <S%H4325><s%> to flow <S%H5140><s%> out of the rock <S%H6697><s%> for them; <S%H1234><s%> he split the rock <S%H6697><s%> also, <S%H4325><s%> and the waters gushed out. <S%H2100><s%>
"There is no peace, <S%H7965><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "for the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>"
